name: Bean of the Wild
description:
bean.

Features -

  • All the runes from Breath of the Wild recreated in Unity
  • Pretty Grass (From an Asset)
  • Pretty Sky (From an Asset)
  • Bean (Not from an Asset)
  • Beautiful sword animations
  • Waterfall slingshot
  • Time rewind capabilities
  • Some pretty nice low-poly Zelda models
  • Love
